DellNICCapabilities.description: An instance of DellNICCapabilities will have data specific to NIC and its port and partitions capabilities.
DellNICCapabilities.longDescription: An instance of DellNICCapabilities will have data specific to NIC and its port and partitions capabilities.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BPESupport.description: This property represents Bridge Port Extension (BPE) for the ports of the NIC.
BPESupport.longDescription: This property represents Bridge Port Extension (BPE) for the ports of the NIC.

CongestionNotification.description: This property represents congestion notification support for a NIC port.
CongestionNotification.longDescription: This property represents congestion notification support for a NIC port.

DCBExchangeProtocol.description: This property represents DCB Exchange protocol support for a NIC port.
DCBExchangeProtocol.longDescription: This property represents DCB Exchange protocol support for a NIC port.

ETS.description: This property represents Enhanced Transmission Selection support for a NIC port.
ETS.longDescription: This property represents Enhanced Transmission Selection support for a NIC port.

EVBModesSupport.description: This property represents EVB Edge Virtual Bridging) mode support for the ports of the NIC. Possible values are 0 Unknown, 2 Supported, 3 Not Supported.
EVBModesSupport.longDescription: This property represents EVB Edge Virtual Bridging) mode support for the ports of the NIC. Possible values are 0 Unknown, 2 Supported, 3 Not Supported.

FCoEBootSupport.description: The property shall represent FCoE boot support for a NIC port.
FCoEBootSupport.longDescription: The property shall represent FCoE boot support for a NIC port.

FCoEMaxIOsPerSession.description: This property represents the maximum number of I/Os per connection supported by the NIC.
FCoEMaxIOsPerSession.longDescription: This property represents the maximum number of I/Os per connection supported by the NIC.

FCoEMaxNPIVPerPort.description: This property represents the maximum number of FCoE targets supported by the NIC.
FCoEMaxNPIVPerPort.longDescription: This property represents the maximum number of FCoE targets supported by the NIC.

FCoEMaxNumberExchanges.description: This property represents the maximum number of exchanges for the NIC.
FCoEMaxNumberExchanges.longDescription: This property represents the maximum number of exchanges for the NIC.

FCoEMaxNumberLogins.description: This property represents the maximum logins per port for the NIC.
FCoEMaxNumberLogins.longDescription: This property represents the maximum logins per port for the NIC.

FCoEMaxNumberOfFCTargets.description: This property represents the maximum number of FCoE targets supported by the NIC.
FCoEMaxNumberOfFCTargets.longDescription: This property represents the maximum number of FCoE targets supported by the NIC.

FCoEMaxNumberOutStandingCommands.description: This property represents the maximum number of outstanding commands supported across all connections for the NIC.
FCoEMaxNumberOutStandingCommands.longDescription: This property represents the maximum number of outstanding commands supported across all connections for the NIC.

FCoEOffloadSupport.description: The property shall represent FCoE offload support for the NIC.
FCoEOffloadSupport.longDescription: The property shall represent FCoE offload support for the NIC.

FeatureLicensingSupport.description: This property represents feature licensing support for the NIC.
FeatureLicensingSupport.longDescription: This property represents feature licensing support for the NIC.

FlexAddressingSupport.description: The property shall represent flex adddressing support for a NIC port.
FlexAddressingSupport.longDescription: The property shall represent flex adddressing support for a NIC port.

IPSecOffloadSupport.description: This property represents IPSec offload support for a NIC port.
IPSecOffloadSupport.longDescription: This property represents IPSec offload support for a NIC port.

MACSecSupport.description: This property represents secure MAC support for a NIC port.
MACSecSupport.longDescription: This property represents secure MAC support for a NIC port.

NWManagementPassThrough.description: This property represents network management passthrough support for a NIC port.
NWManagementPassThrough.longDescription: This property represents network management passthrough support for a NIC port.

NicPartitioningSupport.description: This property represents partitioning support for the NIC.
NicPartitioningSupport.longDescription: This property represents partitioning support for the NIC.

OSBMCManagementPassThrough.description: This property represents OS-inband to BMC-out-of-band management passthrough support for a NIC port.
OSBMCManagementPassThrough.longDescription: This property represents OS-inband to BMC-out-of-band management passthrough support for a NIC port.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OnChipThermalSensor.description: This property represents on-chip thermal sensor support for the NIC.
OnChipThermalSensor.longDescription: This property represents on-chip thermal sensor support for the NIC.

OpenFlowSupport.description: This property represents open-flow support for a NIC port.
OpenFlowSupport.longDescription: This property represents open-flow support for a NIC port.

PXEBootSupport.description: The property shall represent PXE boot support for a NIC port.
PXEBootSupport.longDescription: The property shall represent PXE boot support for a NIC port.

PartitionWOLSupport.description: This property represents Wake-On-LAN support for a NIC partition.
PartitionWOLSupport.longDescription: This property represents Wake-On-LAN support for a NIC partition.

PersistencePolicySupport.description: This property specifies whether the card supports persistence policy.
PersistencePolicySupport.longDescription: This property specifies whether the card supports persistence policy.

PriorityFlowControl.description: This property represents priority flow-control support for a NIC port.
PriorityFlowControl.longDescription: This property represents priority flow-control support for a NIC port.

RDMASupport.description: This property represents RDMA support for a NIC port.
RDMASupport.longDescription: This property represents RDMA support for a NIC port.

RemotePHY.description: This property represents remote PHY support for a NIC port.
RemotePHY.longDescription: This property represents remote PHY support for a NIC port.

TCPChimneySupport.description: This property represents TCP Chimney support for a NIC port.
TCPChimneySupport.longDescription: This property represents TCP Chimney support for a NIC port.

TCPOffloadEngineSupport.description: This property represents the support of TCP Offload Engine for a NIC port.
TCPOffloadEngineSupport.longDescription: This property represents the support of TCP Offload Engine for a NIC port.

VEB.description: This property provides details about the VEB (Virtual Ethernet Bridging) - single channel support for the ports of the NIC.
VEB.longDescription: This property provides details about the VEB (Virtual Ethernet Bridging) - single channel support for the ports of the NIC.

VEBVEPAMultiChannel.description: This property provides details about the VEB-VEPA (Virtual Ethernet Bridging and Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator) multichannel support for the ports of the NIC.
VEBVEPAMultiChannel.longDescription: This property provides details about the VEB-VEPA (Virtual Ethernet Bridging and Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator) multichannel support for the ports of the NIC.

VEBVEPASingleChannel.description: This property provides details about the VEB-VEPA (Virtual Ethernet Bridging and Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator) - single channel support for the ports of the NIC.
VEBVEPASingleChannel.longDescription: This property provides details about the VEB-VEPA (Virtual Ethernet Bridging and Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator) - single channel support for the ports of the NIC.

VirtualLinkControl.description: This property represents virtual link-control support for a NIC partition.
VirtualLinkControl.longDescription: This property represents virtual link-control support for a NIC partition.

iSCSIBootSupport.description: The property shall represent iSCSI boot support for a NIC port.
iSCSIBootSupport.longDescription: The property shall represent iSCSI boot support for a NIC port.

iSCSIOffloadSupport.description: The property shall represent iSCSI offload support for a NIC port.
iSCSIOffloadSupport.longDescription: The property shall represent iSCSI offload support for a NIC port.

uEFISupport.description: This property represents UEFI support for a NIC port.
uEFISupport.longDescription: This property represents UEFI support for a NIC port.

title: #DellNICCapabilities.v1_2_0.DellNICCapabilities
